title: Driving without tears
creator_credit: Hector Lemieux, Peter Jones and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: We accompany a driving instructor to see how the City of Vancouver trains expert and responsible motorists. Shows how a driving school gives both theoretical and practical teaching on all the intricacies of city and highway traffic. The film includes reference to training programs in secondary schools to make teenagers better drivers.
